com.mapgroup.classificator.controller

Class PredictionExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapgroup.classificator.controller.PredictionExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IServerExecutor

    public class PredictionExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IServerExecutor
    This class grants to predict a specific class value starting from specific requests made by the user.

    • Method Detail

      • executeCommand

        public ServerResponse executeCommand(ContextRequest contextRequest)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Satisfies the user's request of predicting a class value using the structure which contains all the user's choices and uses them to predict the correct class value contained in the decision tree specified in the context structure passed to the method.

        The context request structure must have these specific parameters in the order:

        • decision tree
        • null
        • the data structure which contains the user choices
        Specified by:
        executeCommand in interface IServerExecutor
        Parameters:
        contextRequest - information about the context in which the computation will be done
        Returns:
        the server response which contains the predicted value generated from the user's choices
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • predictClass

        private java.lang.String predictClass(DecisionTree tree)
                               throws NoTreeExists,
                                      UnknownValueException
        Inspects the decision tree constructed following the options chosen by the user in order to get the predicted value.
        Parameters:
        tree - the current decision tree
        Returns:
        the predicted value for this prediction session
        Throws:
        NoTreeExists - if no available tree was present
        UnknownValueException - if an incorrect choice was selected by the user
